title: Wrapping expr in curly braces changes the operator precedence

labels.name: A-parser
labels.description: Area: The parsing of Rust source code to an AST.

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
[This program](http://is.gd/rdq1jt) prints different values depending upon whether the `v1` or `v2` initializer is surrounded by curly braces:

``` rust
fn main() {
    let v1 = { 1 + {2} * {3} }; // 9, indicating a parse of (1 + 2) * 3
    let v2 =   1 + {2} * {3}  ; // 7, indicating a parse of 1 + (2 * 3)
    println!("{}", v1);
    println!("{}", v2);
}
```

I think it should print `7` for both lines.  `parser-lalr -v` accepts this program and consistently parses 1 + (2 \* 3) for both lines.

```
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprBlock
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprBinary
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   BiAdd
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprLit
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (LitInteger
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   1
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprBinary
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   BiMul
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprBlock
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprLit
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (LitInteger
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   2
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprBlock
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (ExprLit
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   (LitInteger
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   3
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   )
```
